user_query: I need to gather external information about a specific device-asset. The identifier is '71491234-A'. Can you please assist me in retrieving the code, status, and message associated with this identifier? Also, let me know if there are any optional parameters available for this API call.

TaskList.description: Retrieve external information about the device-asset using the identifier '71491234-A'. This will provide the code, status, and message associated with the asset.
Check if there are any optional parameters available for the API call related to the device-asset information retrieval.
